testcase.name: feature
testcase.system-out:
Feature: Login to account
Scenario Outline: Login to account using valid and invalid credentials # Login.feature:3 Given User navigates to "<url>" login page And User type "<username>" username And User type "<password>" password When User clicks on Login Button Then User should be presented with "<message>" message
Examples: WebElement is visible using locator: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (79577b33efc4236851ff3848e9a5cb4f)] -> id: text]> Successfully Sent the following keys: 'andreyivanov' to element: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (79577b33efc4236851ff3848e9a5cb4f)] -> id: text]> WebElement is visible using locator: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (79577b33efc4236851ff3848e9a5cb4f)] -> id: password]> Successfully Sent the following keys: '198632' to element: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (79577b33efc4236851ff3848e9a5cb4f)] -> id: password]> WebElement is clickable using locator: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (79577b33efc4236851ff3848e9a5cb4f)] -> id: login-button]> true
Scenario Outline: Login to account using valid and invalid credentials # Login.feature:11 Given User navigates to "http://webdriveruniversity.com/Login-Portal/run.html" login page # LoginSteps.user_navigates_to_login_page(String) And User type "andreyivanov" username # LoginSteps.user_type_username(String) And User type "198632" password # LoginSteps.user_type_password(String) When User clicks on Login Button # LoginSteps.user_clicks_on_Login_Button() java.lang.NullPointerException at pageObjects.Login_Page.clickLoginButton(Login_Page.java:42) at stepDifinitions.LoginSteps.user_clicks_on_Login_Button(LoginSteps.java:31) at ✽.When User clicks on Login Button(Login.feature:7)
Then User should be presented with "validation failed" message # LoginSteps.user_should_be_presented_with_message(String) WebElement is visible using locator: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (5325d991504d576579c2a86ccad2db64)] -> id: text]> Successfully Sent the following keys: 'webdriver123' to element: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (5325d991504d576579c2a86ccad2db64)] -> id: text]> WebElement is visible using locator: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (5325d991504d576579c2a86ccad2db64)] -> id: password]> Successfully Sent the following keys: 'webdriver123' to element: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (5325d991504d576579c2a86ccad2db64)] -> id: password]> WebElement is clickable using locator: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (5325d991504d576579c2a86ccad2db64)] -> id: login-button]> true
Scenario Outline: Login to account using valid and invalid credentials # Login.feature:12 Given User navigates to "http://webdriveruniversity.com/Login-Portal/run.html" login page # LoginSteps.user_navigates_to_login_page(String) And User type "webdriver123" username # LoginSteps.user_type_username(String) And User type "webdriver123" password # LoginSteps.user_type_password(String) When User clicks on Login Button # LoginSteps.user_clicks_on_Login_Button() java.lang.NullPointerException at pageObjects.Login_Page.clickLoginButton(Login_Page.java:42) at stepDifinitions.LoginSteps.user_clicks_on_Login_Button(LoginSteps.java:31) at ✽.When User clicks on Login Button(Login.feature:7)
Then User should be presented with "validation succeeded" message # LoginSteps.user_should_be_presented_with_message(String)
